predicate: Only the values of nrofSymbols which are integer multiples of the configured repetitionFactor can be configured.
notes: The constraint applies only when r17 is enabled, ensuring nrofSymbols is a multiple of repetitionFactor.

meta.evidence: \begin{tabular}{l} resourceMapping OFDM symbol location of the SRS resource within a slot including nrofSymbols (number of OFDM symbols), startPosition (value 0 refers to the last symbol, value 1 refers to the second last symbol, and so on) and repetitionFactor (see TS 38.214 [19], clause 6.2.1 and TS 38.211 [16], clause 6.4.1.4). The configured SRS resource does not exceed the slot boundary. If resourceMapping-r16 is signalled, UE shall ignore the resourceMapping (without suffix). If resourceMapping-r17 is signalled, UE shall ignore the resourceMapping (without suffix) and only the values of nrofSymbols which are integer multiples of the configured repetitionFactor can be configured. For CLI SRS-RSRP measurement, the network always configures nrofSymbois and repetitionFactor to ' n 1 '. \end{tabular} \begin{tabular}{l}
